definition: to kill/to murder/to attack/to weaken or reduce/to smart (dialect)/(used after a verb) extremely

sentences.english: He says they'll use suicide bombers in their attacks.
sentences.chinese: 他說他們會在襲擊中使用自殺式炸彈。

sentences.english: Police are interviewing 2 people in Atlanta after an apartment murder-suicide left 4 people dead.
sentences.chinese: 亞特蘭大一公寓內發生自殺式謀殺案，導致4人死亡。

sentences.english: It started with a suicide bomb.
sentences.chinese: 它開始於一次自殺式炸彈襲擊。

sentences.english: Yeah. I think the suicide bombers do have ideals.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我認爲自殺式襲擊者是有理想的。

sentences.english: Women often wear double abayas to hide their suicide vests.
sentences.chinese: 女性經常穿兩件長袍來隱藏她們的自殺式炸彈背心。

sentences.english: Right? We are kind of suicide bomber.
sentences.chinese: 就像自殺式襲擊者那樣。

sentences.english: Six suicide bombers made it inside and an unknown number of gunmen.
sentences.chinese: 六名自殺式炸彈襲擊者和人數不詳的槍手潛入大樓裏。

sentences.english: Suicide bomber injures senior Saudi prince.
sentences.chinese: 沙特親王遭遇自殺式爆炸襲擊受傷。

sentences.english: Baida initially did not plan to become a suicide bomber.
sentences.chinese: 拜妲最初並不打算成爲一名自殺式炸彈襲擊者。
